eng.title: How important are elections to you?
eng.description: Tell us about your reasons for voting, and what influences your choices. This will help us get a better idea of who is filling in the questions.

questions.title: What are your reasons for not planning to vote?
questions.description: Choose the one that MOST explains your reasons.
options: No party addresses the issues I am most interested in
I don't believe anything the politicians say
I don't trust that the voting process will keep my vote secret
I am worried that there will be violence on voting day
All politicians are corrupt or only interested in benefiting themselves

questions.title: What are your reasons for planning to vote?
questions.description: Choose the one that MOST explains your reasons.
options: I want to support the party that has helped me and  my family
I want to support the party I feel has done the most for the country
I want the policies that interest me to be actioned
We need a change in leadership
I HAVE to vote (no particular reason)
My family and friends expect me to vote

questions.title: What are your reasons for not knowing whether you’ll vote or not?
questions.description: Choose the one that MOST explains your reasons.
options: I don't know which party to vote for
I'm not sure if it’s going to be safe to vote in my area
I'm not sure if I will be able to make it to the voting station

questions.title: How important are elections in changing your life?
How important are elections in changing living conditions in my community?
How important are elections in changing living conditions for other people in the country?
What influenced your decision to register to vote?
questions.description: Choose the one that MOST explains your reasons.
options: Political party door-to-door/ telephonic/ media campaigning
Peers and teachers at school/ college/ university
Potential/ current employment is dependent on this

questions.title: What influenced your decision to not register to vote?
questions.description: Choose the one that MOST explains your reasons.
options: I moved to a different place from where I initially registered
I couldn't make time to go register
I didn't know my local voting station
I couldn't get to my local voting station

questions.title: In the past 12 months, for how many parties have you attended a political rally?
In the past 12 months, how many times did you listen to a political rally?
questions.description: (on radio and other forms of media)

questions.title: In the past 12 months, for how many parties have you attended a political party manifesto launch?
In the past 12 months, how many times did you listen to political party manifesto launch?
questions.description: (on radio and other forms of media)

questions.title: In the past 12 months, how many times did you listen to speeches/ interviews/ comments made by political party representatives?
